member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine
member.summary:
Razor Hosting Engine that allows execution of Razor templates outside of ASP.NET. You can execute templates from string or a textreader and output to string or a text reader.
This implementation only supports C#.

member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1
member.summary:
Razor Hosting Engine that allows execution of Razor templates outside of ASP.NET. You can execute templates from string or a textreader and output to string or a text reader.
This implementation only supports C#.

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Any errors that occurred during template execution

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.LastGeneratedCode
member.summary: Last generated output

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.Configuration
member.summary: Holds Razor Configuration Properties

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.HostContainer
member.summary:
Provide a reference to a RazorHost container so that it can be passed to a template.
This may be null, but if a container is available this value is set and passed on to the template as HostContainer.

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.CodeProvider
member.summary: The code provider used with this instance

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.ReferencedNamespaces
member.summary:
A list of default namespaces to include
Defaults already included: System, System.Text, System.IO, System.Collections.Generic, System.Linq

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.ReferencedAssemblies
member.summary:
A list of default assemblies referenced during compilation
Defaults already included: System, System.Text, System.IO, System.Collections.Generic, System.Linq

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.AssemblyCache
member.summary: Internally cache assemblies loaded with ParseAndCompileTemplate. Assemblies are cached in the EngineHost so they don't have to cross AppDomains for invocation when running in a separate AppDomain

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.TemplatePerRequestConfigurationData
member.summary:
A property that holds any per request configuration data that is to be passed to the template. This object is passed to InitializeTemplate after the instance was created.
This object must be serializable. This object should be set on every request and cleared out after each request

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.#ctor(Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the host and performs basic configuration Optionally pass in any required namespaces and assemblies by name

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.AddAssembly(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Method to add assemblies to the referenced assembly list. Use the DLL name or strongly typed name. Assembly added HAS to be accessible via GAC or in bin/privatebin path
member.param: Path to the assembly. GAC'd assemblies or assemblies in current path can be provided without a path. All others should contain a fully qualified OS path. Note that Razor does not look in the PrivateBin path for the AppDomain.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.AddAssemblyFromType(System.Type)
member.summary: Adds an assembly to the Referenced assemblies based on a type reference. Useful to add the 'host' assembly and model types.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.AddAssemblyFromType(System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an assembly to the ReferenceAssemblies based on an object instance. Easy way to add a model's assembly.
member.param: any object instance

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.AddNamespace(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary:
Method to add namespaces to the compiled code. Add namespaces to minimize explicit namespace requirements in your Razor template code.
Make sure that any required assemblies are loaded first.
member.param: First namespace
additional namespaces

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.AddNamespace(System.String[])
member.summary:
Method to add namespaces to the compiled code. Add namespaces to minimize explicit namespace requirements in your Razor template code.
Make sure that any required assemblies are loaded first.
member.param: First namespace
additional namespaces

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.RenderTemplate(System.IO.TextReader,System.Object,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Execute a template based on a TextReader input into a provided TextWriter object.
member.param: A text reader that reads in the markup template
Name of the namespace that is generated
Name of the class that is generated
Any assembly references required by template as a DLL names. Must be in execution path or GAC.
Optional model available in the template as this.Context
A text writer that receives the rendered template output. Writer is closed after rendering. When provided the result of this method is string.Empty (success) or null (failure)
member.returns: output from template. If an outputWriter is passed in result is string.Empty on success, null on failure

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.RenderTemplate(System.String,System.Object,System.IO.TextWriter,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Execute a template based on a TextReader input into a provided TextWriter object.
member.param: A string that contains the markup template
Name of the namespace that is generated
Name of the class that is generated
Any assembly references required by template as a DLL names. Must be in execution path or GAC.
Optional model available in the template as this.Context
A text writer that receives the rendered template output. Writer is closed after rendering. When provided the result of this method is string.Empty (success) or null (failure)
If true, tries to infer the model type when no @model or @inherits tags are defined for the template
member.returns: output from template. If an outputWriter is passed in result is string.Empty on success, null on failure

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.RenderTemplateFromAssembly(System.String,System.Object,System.IO.TextWriter,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a template based on a previously compiled and cached assembly reference. This effectively allows you to cache an assembly.
member.param: A text writer that receives output generated by the template. Writer is closed after rendering.
member.returns: output from template. If an outputWriter is passed in result is string.Empty on success, null on failure

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.CompileTemplate(System.IO.TextReader,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses and compiles a markup template into an assembly and returns an assembly name. The name is an ID that can be passed to ExecuteTemplateByAssembly which picks up a cached instance of the loaded assembly.
member.param: Any referenced assemblies by dll name only. Assemblies must be in execution path of host or in GAC.
Textreader that loads the template
The namespace of the class to generate from the template. null generates name.
The name of the class to generate from the template. null generates name.
member.remarks: The actual assembly isn't returned here to allow for cross-AppDomain operation. If the assembly was returned it would fail for cross-AppDomain calls.
member.returns: An assembly Id. The Assembly is cached in memory and can be used with RenderFromAssembly.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.CompileTemplate(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses and compiles a markup template into an assembly and returns an assembly name. The name is an ID that can be passed to ExecuteTemplateByAssembly which picks up a cached instance of the loaded assembly.
member.param: Text of the template to render
Namespace for the generated class. If not passed will be __RazorHosting
Classname for the generated class. If not passed will be a generated unique name based on GUID
Optional type of the model passed with this template - used for @model fixup
member.remarks: The actual assembly isn't returned here to allow for cross-AppDomain operation. If the assembly was returned it would fail for cross-AppDomain calls.
member.returns: An assembly Id. The Assembly is cached in memory and can be used with RenderFromAssembly.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngine`1.CreateHost(System.String,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the RazorHost with various options applied. Applies basic namespace imports and the name of the class to generate

member.summary: Allows retrieval of an Assembly cached internally by its id returned from ParseAndCompileTemplate. Useful if you want to write an assembly to disk for later activation

Overridable instance creation routine for the host.

member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1
member.summary:
Factory that creates a RazorHost instance in a remote AppDomain that can be unloaded. This allows unloading of assemblies created through scripting.
Both static and instance loader methods are available. For AppDomain created hosts.
Note: Only works for a single AppDomain as this class holds on to the AppDomain as a Singleton.

member.name: F:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.LocalAppDomain
member.summary: Internal instance of the AppDomain to hang onto when running in a separate AppDomain. Ensures the AppDomain stays alive.

member.name: F:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.Current
member.summary: Internally managed instance of the HostFactory that ensures that the AppDomain stays alive and that it can be unloaded manually using the static methods.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.CreateRazorHost(Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider)
member.summary: Create an instance of the RazorHost in the current AppDomain. No special handling...

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.CreateRazorHostInAppDomain
member.summary: Creates an instance of the RazorHost in a new AppDomain. This version creates a static singleton that that is cached and you can call UnloadRazorHostInAppDomain to unload it.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.UnloadRazorHostInAppDomain
member.summary: Unloads the Razor host if running in a separate appdomain by unloading the AppDomain.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.GetRazorHost(Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider)
member.summary: Create a new instance of Razor Host in the current AppDomain.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.GetRazorHostInAppDomain
member.summary: Instance method that creates a RazorHost in a new AppDomain. This method requires that you keep the Factory around in order to keep the AppDomain alive and be able to unload it.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.CreateAppDomain(System.String)
member.summary: Internally creates a new AppDomain in which Razor templates can be run.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.CurrentDomain_AssemblyResolve(System.Object,System.ResolveEventArgs)
member.summary: Allow for custom assembly resolution to local file paths for signed dependency assemblies.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorEngineFactory`1.UnloadHost
member.summary: Allow unloading of the created AppDomain to release resources All internal resources in the AppDomain are released including in memory compiled Razor assemblies.

member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1
member.summary:
Based Host implementation for hosting the RazorEngine. This base acts as a host wrapper for implementing high level host services around the RazorEngine class.
Provides the ability to run in a separate AppDomain and to cache and store generated assemblies to avoid constant parsing and recompilation.
For example implementations can provide assembly template caching so assemblies don't recompile for each access.
member.typeparam: The RazorTemplateBase class that templates will be based on

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.UseAppDomain
member.summary: Determines whether the Container hosts Razor in a separate AppDomain. Seperate AppDomain hosting allows unloading and releasing of resources.

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.ThrowExceptions
member.summary: Determines whether errors throw exceptions or return error status messages.

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.CodeProvider
member.summary: Optionally provide a CSharpCodeProvider code Default uses System.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.BaseBinaryFolder
member.summary:
Base folder location where the AppDomain is hosted. By default uses the same folder as the host application.
Determines where binary dependencies are found for assembly references.

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.ReferencedAssemblies
member.summary: List of referenced assemblies as string values. Must be in GAC or in the current folder of the host app/ base BinaryFolder

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.ReferencedNamespaces
member.summary:
List of additional namespaces to add to all templates.
By default: System, System.Text, System.IO, System.Linq

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.GeneratedNamespace
member.summary: Name of the generated namespace for template classes

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Any error messages

member.name: F:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.Engine
member.summary: Cached instance of the Host. Required to keep the reference to the host alive for multiple uses.

member.name: F:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.LoadedAssemblies
member.summary:
Keep track of each compiled assembly and when it was compiled.
Use a hash of the string to identify string changes.

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.Configuration
member.summary: Engine Configuration

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.Start
member.summary: Call to start the Host running. Follow by a calls to RenderTemplate to render individual templates. Call Stop when done.
member.returns: true or false - check ErrorMessage on false

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.Stop
member.summary: Stops the Host and releases the host AppDomain and cached assemblies.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.RenderTemplate(System.IO.TextReader,System.Object,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary:
Stock implementation of RenderTemplate that doesn't allow for any sort of assembly caching. Instead it creates and re-renders templates read from the reader each time.
Custom implementations of RenderTemplate should be created that allow for caching by examing a filename or string hash to determine whether a template needs to be re-generated and compiled before rendering.
member.param: TextReader that points at the template to compile
Optional model data to pass to template
TextReader passed in that receives output

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.RenderTemplateFromAssembly(System.String,System.Object,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Renders a template based on a previously compiled assembly reference. This method allows for caching assemblies by their assembly Id.
member.param: Id of a previously compiled assembly
Optional model data object
Output writer
Namespace for compiled template to execute
Class name for compiled template to execute

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorBaseHostContainer`1.GetSafeClassName(System.Object)
member.summary:
Returns a unique ClassName for a template to execute Optionally pass in an objectId on which the code is based or null to get default behavior.
Default implementation just returns Guid as string

member.summary: Adds an assembly to the referenced assemblies from an existing .NET Type.

member.summary: Adds an assembly to the referenced assemblies from an existing object instance.

member.summary: Force this host to stay alive indefinitely

member.summary: Sets an error message consistently

member.summary: Sets an error message consistently

member.summary: Automatically stops the host

member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorFolderHostContainer
member.summary:
This class is a caching directory based host wrapper around the RazorHost classes to provide directory based Razor template execution. Templates are compiled on the fly, and cached unless the templates on disk are changed.
Runs Razor Templates in a seperate AppDomain
Uses the RazorTemplateFolderHost base template by default. For any other template implementation use the generic parameter to specify the template type.

member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorFolderHostContainer`1
member.summary:
This class is a caching directory based host wrapper around the RazorHost classes to provide directory based Razor template execution. Templates are compiled on the fly, and cached unless the templates on disk are changed.
Runs Razor Templates in a seperate AppDomain
member.typeparam: The type of the base template to use

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorFolderHostContainer`1.TemplatePath
member.summary: The Path where templates live

member.summary: When rendering to a file render output to this file.

member.summary: Renders a template to a TextWriter. Useful to write output into a stream or the Response object. Used for partial rendering.
member.param: Relative path to the file in the folder structure
Optional context object or null
Optional parameter that is set as the Model property in generic versions
The textwriter to write output into

member.summary: Internally checks if a cached assembly exists and if it does uses it else creates and compiles one. Returns an assembly Id to be used with the LoadedAssembly list.

member.summary: Determine if a file has been changed since a known date. Dates are specified in UTC format.

member.summary: Overridden to return a unique name based on the filename

member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorStringHostContainer
member.summary:
Razor Host container to execute Razor Templates from string input.
Can run templates in a separate AppDomain and caches templates to avoid re-compilation and allocation of new resources for each template.

member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorStringHostContainer`1
member.summary:
Razor Host container to execute Razor Templates from string input.
Can run templates in a separate AppDomain and caches templates to avoid re-compilation and allocation of new resources for each template.

members.member:
Call this method to actually render a template to the specified outputfile " The template text to parse and render
Any object that will be available in the template as a dynamic of this.Context or if the type matches the template type this.Model.
Optional textwriter that output is written to If true infers the model type if no @model or @inherits tag is provided rendering results or null on failure. If a writer is a passed string.Empty is returned or null for failure

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorStringHostContainer`1.RenderTemplateToFile(System.String,System.Object,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Renders a template from a string input to a file output. Same text templates are compiled and cached for re-use.
member.param: Text of the template to run
Optional model to pass
Output file where output is sent to
If true infers the model type if no @model or @inherits tag is provided

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorStringHostContainer`1.GetAssemblyFromStringAndCache(System.String)
member.summary: Internally tries to retrieve a previously compiled template from cache if not found compiles a template into an assembly always returns an assembly id as a string.
member.param: The text to parse
member.returns: assembly id as a string or null on error

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorResponse.SetTextWriter(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Allows overriding the TextWriter used write output to. Note: This method MUST be called before any output has been written to the Response to capture the entire response.

member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorTemplateBase`1
member.summary:
Base class used for Razor Page Templates - Razor generates a class from the parsed Razor markup and this class is the base class. Class must implement an Execute() method that is overridden by the parser and contains the code that generates the markup. Write() and WriteLiteral() must be implemented to handle output generation inside of the Execute() generated code.
This class can be subclassed to provide custom functionality. One common feature likely will be to provide Context style properties that are application specific (ie. HelpBuilderContext) and strongly typed and easily accesible in Razor markup code.

member.name: P:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorTemplateBase`1.Model
member.summary: Create a strongly typed model

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorTemplateBase`1.InitializeTemplate(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary:
This method is called upon instantiation and allows passing custom configuration data to the template from the Engine.
This method can then be overridden

member.name: T:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorTemplateBase
member.summary:
Base class used for Razor Page Templates - Razor generates a class from the parsed Razor markup and this class is the base class. Class must implement an Execute() method that is overridden by the parser and contains the code that generates the markup. Write() and WriteLiteral() must be implemented to handle output generation inside of the Execute() generated code.
This class can be subclassed to provide custom functionality. One common feature likely will be to provide Context style properties that are application specific (ie. HelpBuilderContext) and strongly typed and easily accesible in Razor markup code.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorTemplateBase.RenderTemplate(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary:
Allows rendering a dynamic template from within the running template. The template passed must be a string and you can pass a model for rendering.
This is useful to support nested templating for allowing rendered values to contain embedded Razor template expressions which is useful where user generated content may contain Razor template logic.

member.name: M:Westwind.RazorHosting.RazorTemplateBase.Execute
member.summary: Razor Parser overrides this method, but this method is effectively never called - it's just a placeholder in order to allow invoking the template.

member.summary: Force this host to stay alive indefinitely
